item.description:
The United Native American Cultural Center at Devens
MA (the old FT DEVENS) is having their yearly Pow Wow this Sat and
Sun May 16 and17.

******** A friend of mine, Paul Johnson, is the MC and he will be playing with his drum group. He has asked me to invite everyone... I have posted the event on 5 meetup grp sites. Sorry this is last minute! I just got the info today. * In the event of rain, since it's outdoors, I will be canceling this event. Please make sure to check for any messages/updates before heading out.*******

Cost: FREE (parking is also FREE)

Time: 12:30 pm - ?


DIRECTIONS: It's easy to find. Go to 495 from east or west until you get
to the RT2/RT110 Littleton/Ayer exit. Go to AYER down
2A/110. Once you get to traffic circle take 2nd exit then drive
straight until you see Devens on your LEFT.
Enter and you are there! There will also be signage in Ayer
directing you to the powwow starting at the traffic circle.

******From Paul Johnson :
I will be easy to find as I am MC and my Drum group is
playing there--or just ask for Grumpy Bear. Event starts at
12PM both days,free parking
item.how_to_find_us: meetup at the front entrnace at 12:30
item.name: Last Minute Event - NATIVE AMERICAN POW WOW
